document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Authorization Forms
security: The document is redacted to protect Social Security numbers, citing that their public disclosure would constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, outweighing the public interest.
summary: This document is a notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponed release of Social Security numbers within HSCA staff payroll records, along with payroll authorization forms for Michael C. Eberhardt.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents includes a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board concerning the postponement of Social Security number releases in HSCA staff payroll records due to privacy concerns, as well as payroll authorization forms and memoranda related to Michael C. Eberhardt's employment with the HSCA. Eberhardt held positions such as Staff Counsel and Assistant Deputy Chief Counsel, with corresponding salary adjustments and effective dates, as authorized by Louis Stokes and other officials within the HSCA during 1977 and 1978.
title: Assassination Records Review Board Final Determination Notification and HSCA Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
